title: OpenRA bot strategy wiki
text: Build barracks first, then war factory, and keep producing tanks for pressure. Scout early and expand economy with harvesters.

title: OpenRA bot strategy wiki
text: Harvester management and constant unit production are key. Use attack-move to push map control.

title: OpenRA community notes
text: Fast refinery timing and stable power are important. Scout enemy base before committing to attack.

title: OpenRA gameplay tips
text: Players often queue infantry early, then transition to tanks and map scouting.

title: OpenRA Red Alert gameplay
text: Expand economy, defend harvesters, and pressure enemy with armor.

title: OpenRA Red Alert tips
text: Use reconnaissance to identify weak points before a direct attack.

title: OpenRA tactical guide
text: Build power plant, barracks, refinery; train infantry and keep scouting the map.

title: RTS command patterns
text: Typical RTS actions include build, train, gather resources, scout, and attack.

title: OpenRA actor list
text: Common actors include harvesters, engineers, infantry, and tanks across factions.

title: OpenRA command style note
text: Players describe orders in short phrases: produce units, scout, attack, defend, expand.
